metadata.dc:title: Ação da nitrofurazona (5-nitro-2-furaldeído-semicarbazona) sôbre as formas intracelulares do Trypanosoma cruzi na doença de Chagas experimental.
[Action of nitrofurazone (5-nitro-2-furaldehyde-semicarbazone) on the intracellular forms of Trypanosoma intracellular forms of Trypanosoma cruzi in experimental Chagas' disease].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista do Instituto de Medicina Tropical de Sao Paulo
